definition: existing or available in large quantities; plentiful
showing great attention to detail; very careful and precise
fluent or persuasive in speaking or writing
well meaning and kindly
having or showing care and conscientiousness in one's work or duties
sparing or economical with regard to money or food
fond of company; sociable
feeling or expressing great happiness and triumph
affected by lethargy; sluggish and apathetic
stubbornly refusing to change one's opinion or chosen course of action
able to withstand or recover quickly from difficult conditions
tending to keep a firm hold of something; clinging or adhering closely
able to adapt or be adapted to many different functions or activities
playfully quaint or fanciful, especially in an appealing and amusing way
having or showing zeal; fervent or enthusiastic
make or become less
grow or develop in a healthy or vigorous way
continue in a course of action even in the face of difficulty
examine or inspect closely and thoroughly
restore friendly relations between; make or show to be compatible
entry way into a room
view in and out of a room
